tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
The doctor spends valuable time in explaining the patient about the condition and remedy which we is most  important requirement for the patient.
Understands the difficulty of the patient during the treatment and makes the patient comfortable without hurrying the procedures.
Clarifies all doubts with a cheerful face 
My treatment experience gave me full satisfaction and I would like to recommend the people of this locality to visit his clinic for a better dental care/ treatment experience

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Yet another pleasant session for removal of decay and for dental fillings. * ***** *** ** ** *** ** *** **** ******** ** **** ************* I used to be terrified abt getting treated for dental issues. But Dr.Prem changed my perspective, he explained the issue, made me comfortable, asked for my consent before starting the procedure. He wont push you into unnecessary procedures, unless or until it is required. I think i almost annoyed him with my queries, but still he answered them patiently despite the long queue of patients. Although the clinic is not catchy from outside, it really serves the purpose at a moderate cost. And the equipments and instruments are well maintained. Extremely professional. Now, i'm so glad that i found him. I would highly recommend him for your dental issues.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: Went for teeth cleaning. Didn't take more than 15 mins. Doctor was polite and friendly. Upon asking, he informed me about other tooth problem I had, which he had noticed while cleaning. Explained the time taken for treatment and asked me to decide if it is to be treated now or later. I got that treatment done immediately as it didn't take much time.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Doctor was Highly professional *** *** ** *** **** ********* *** *** ** ******** Actually I was bit scarred before treatment but the way he treated was outstanding and there were no pain and didn’t feel any inconvenience, don’t even felt that I was undergoing treatment.
It took 3 sittings for me,one for cleaning and another one for filling the gaps and third was fixing the cap on the top upon my priority, all went well and he charged only the nominal fee

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
context: Crowns and Bridges Fixing,Root Canal Treatment (RCT),
review: Before taking treatment i was little scared,  Dr. Prem Kumar took at most care while doing treatment and explained each and every step of the procedure. I didn't feel any pain during the procedure and i am happy with the treatment. I would definitely recommend Just Smile Dental and Dr. Prem Kumar for any dental treatment for you and your family members.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Explaining me everything in detail with more patience for all my doubts.
Till I get fully satisfied and adjusted with the cap fitting,he offered me several clinical visits.
One day during my visit, current went off and unable to take x-ray. he guided me to his other clinic in the nearby locality to finish up the treatment
reply_text: Thanks for your feedback ma'am. Hope you are fine now.

review:
Understanding the desperate patients' situation and clarifying their doubts with high level of confidence and easy-to-understand language and terminology, boosting their confidence level and make them feel more and more comfortable till the last sitting of the scheduled treatment. 

He is more flexible with timings and also well within the planned schedule.

It was good !! I can definitely go to him for the next time. His way of approach is really good. He explains the  things very well that even any one can understand the exact problem. I give him 4.5 Star for the treatment.
Very good and good professionally done work on teeth cleaning and whitening. He is  on time and answered  all questions.
reply_text: Thanks for your positive feedback. Keep smiling with us..!!!

review: Doctor is very polite and the way of consultation is really awesome.My suggestion we can directly go for consultation without having second thought.
Well good at ,works with fully satisfied nominal charge kind and good heart smiling face treating patient with patient
Prem is an approachable doctor. He patiently addressed my concerns and provided honest treatment options. I would recommend him.
Just started first sitting for root canal treatment. Find satisfactory. Experience with doctor can be given after completion of full treatment.
He was good enough to find the issues and get it sorted on-time such that the patients do not feel the pain or suffer more. It was a good experience.
Diagnostics done good and actual tooth problem fixed, doctor friendly and polite, problem and its solutions explained to me in detail treatment was effective
Explained and performed the procedure patiently with utmost care. Satisfied by his service. Will recommend to friends.
Dr Prem Kumar is very kind and I'm very happy with the treatment that is provided by him.I would like to thank him..

Very patiently explained my problem, various procedures and given proper advice for future course of action. Simultaneously arranged whatever required with personal care adducing top priority, to my entire satisfaction.
Dr. Prem Kumar was very composed and did a good job on my teeth. He was accommodative on rescheduling my appointment at the last minute. Overall, I have had a good experince.

Checked in for a regular dental cleaning. Had 100 percent satisfaction with the result as he performed thoroughly and diligently. I have visited other dental clinic in the past and have not been able to remove my deposit completely. In this regard i would give him 5 star and would definitely visit for my next cleaning . charges 800 rs for regular cleaning and doesn't sell unnecessary maintenance dental tool kit unless you ask for. Value for money!
